SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT pd.user_no, pd.pd_review_no, pd.pd_review_thumb, p.pd_name, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = pd.user_no) AS user_id, pd.pd_review_content, pd.pd_review_file, pd.pd_review_date, (select delete_yn from kap_user where user_no = pd.user_no) as delete_yn FROM pd_review pd LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON pd.pd_id = p.pd_id ORDER BY pd.pd_review_no desc ) A WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} )WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT br.user_no, br.br_review_no, br.br_review_thumb, b.br_name, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = br.user_no) AS user_id, br.br_review_content, br.br_review_file, br.br_review_date, (select delete_yn from kap_user where user_no = br.user_no) as delete_yn FROM br_review br LEFT OUTER JOIN brewery b ON br.br_id = b.br_id ORDER BY br.br_review_no desc ) A WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} )WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select p.pd_name, pr.pd_review_no, pr.user_no, pr.pd_id, pr.pd_review_content, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = pr.user_no) AS user_id, pr.pd_review_file, pr.pd_review_thumb, to_char(pr.pd_review_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')as pd_review_date from pd_review pr left outer join product p on pr.pd_id = p.pd_id where pr.pd_review_no = #{pd_review_no}

select b.br_name, br.br_review_no, br.user_no, br.br_id, br.br_review_content, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = br.user_no) AS user_id, br.br_review_file, br.br_review_thumb, to_char(br.br_review_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')as br_review_date from br_review br left outer join brewery b on br.br_id = b.br_id where br.br_review_no = #{br_review_no}
